import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { RouterOutlet } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', standalone: true, imports: [RouterOutlet], templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrl: './app.component.css' }) export class AppComponent { title = 'dish-app'; }
